com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui

Class PluginSettingsMarkingColorProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.PluginSettingsMarkingColorProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarkingColorProvider

    public class PluginSettingsMarkingColorProvider
extends Object
implements MarkingColorProvider
    The PluginSettingsMarkingColorProvider is a MarkingColorProvider querying the stored MarkingColors of the PluginSettings for the MarkingTypes.

    • Method Detail

      • provideColor

        public MarkingColor provideColor(MarkingType markingType)
        Description copied from interface: MarkingColorProvider
        Provides a color for a MarkingType. Note: Use MarkingColorProvider.Util.provideColor(MarkingColorProvider, Flag) if you have to provide a color for a Flag.
        Specified by:
        provideColor in interface MarkingColorProvider
        Parameters:
        markingType - The MarkingType a MarkingColor should be provided for.
        Note:You might want to use MarkingType.getMarkingTypeForFlag(Flag) or MarkingType.getMarkingTypeForFlags(java.util.Set).
        Returns:
        the MarkingColor for the MarkingType

      • configure

        public void configure(PluginSettings pluginSettings)
        Specified by:
        configure in interface MarkingColorProvider
        Parameters:
        pluginSettings - The plugin settings you want to use to query the MarkingColors for the MarkingTypes.
